Yi-li-sa-pay yise
yu mahida a nikaudip Yi-li-sa-pay u wawa ni Heng-li pase atu ci An-ni.Puo-lin a wawa, wina nida caay pilecuh tu tatamaan a wawa, ci Yi-li-sa-pay caay henay ka tuluay ku mihcaan Patayan. · Yi-li-sa-pay caylim lulu mihcaan siwa bulad pitu demiad lecuhan i Pu-la-sen sikusiya, ina kitidaan u pilecuhan ni ama nida atu ci nida, u padek tu nina nida ku lecuhan tu kakana ci Ma-li-ya yisean, hiyan nu bai ci Ye-ke a Yi-li-sa-pay atu wina nida a bai ci Yi-li-sa-pay. Huo-hua-de ku pinganganan. ci nida u In-ke-lan kuowan Heng-li pase sakatusa maudipay a wawaan, ci ian nida ci Heng-li a sakatusa nu acawa ci An-ni. Puo-lin. sisa nu ayawan ci Heng-li atu Yi-li-sa-pay a padekan nu inaan a kakana ci Ma-li wina nida ci A-la-kun a Kay-sa-lin a nipikikungan nai' ku kikasa sisa ci Ma-li a la'cus milaylay tu kawaw nu heni, sisa ci Yi-li-sa-pay lecuhan mala In-ke-lan tatadengaay milaylayay tina kawawan. 153397·· ci Heng-li siacawa ci An-nian u mukti u ngalay siwawa tu tatamaan a wawaan mamilaylay tu kawaw, kya milaylay tu kawaw nu wancaw a nikacaculukculuk. ci Yi-li-sa-pay i siwa a bulad cacaya bataan a demiad singlian, ci Kan-te'-puo-li ta-cu-ciw ci Tang-ma-se. Ke'-lan-may, Ay-si-te-huo-cie, Nuo-hu-ke'-kun-cie acawa atu Duo-say-te'-huo-cie-tay acawa kala wama atu wina ku pacabayay misingli. 910· caylim lunem mihcaan lima bulad caysiw demiad, ci ina ni Yi-li-sa-pay i tusaay a mihcaan ku walu a buladan patayan, ci A-la-ku a Kay-sa-lin itida tu sepatay nu buladan a mapatay. ci Yi-li-sa-pay hapuhan u bucud a tataynaan a wawa han, sipakayda i nisilsilan tu wanwi inai' ku ngangan. ci An-ni.Puo-lin patayan tu caycay a dimiadan, siacawaaca ci Heng-li ci Cen. Si-muo. Cen. Si-muo i caylim lupic mihcaan lecuhan ci Ay-de-hua caay ka tenes mapataytu. nipilecuhan ni Ay-de-hua tatenga u mamilaylay tu kawaw nu luma', ci Yi-li-sa-pay alaen nida ku dikuc tayda i kiwkay misingli. 1536519·11··1537 saydan ni Yi-li-sa-pay ci Ma-ke-li-te'.Pu-lay-n misulit satu, ci nida " hatidatu ku dawmi', siligiaca, mahida u udip nida, caay henay kaku pakaadih tu mahiniay a wawa". caylim lupic tu laludan, ci Te'-luo-yi a acawa ci Pu'-lan-ci. He'-puo-te' ku midiputay ci Yi-li-sa-payan, malasaydan nida i luma' katukuh tu caylim siplim mihcaan tu hedek atu caylim sipnem mihcaan tu lingatu mituysiw. na dikudan na mikikun ci Kay-sa-lin. "Kay-te'".A-se-li katinengan nu tademaw ci Kay-sa-lin. Cen-puo-naw-n itida i caylimlupic mihcaan malasaydan nu luma' ci Yi-li-sa-pay, caylim nemlim mihcaan amapatay tu nuayawan malacabay tu atu ci Yi-li-sa-pay, nikuda ci Pu-lan-ci. Pa'-li pala kalung han tu nida i luma' nida. ·""1537·15451546·""··15371565· kasikadan a katuuday, nikapatayan ni kakana aku malalum kaku, tungus a tamudungen nu maku, mabiyalaw kaku, nida, nipabeli nu paudipay kuyniyan, apasiketan tu nida a kawaw, mikilul tu ni pabeli nida a wawawan. makabalucuay nu makau mangalay kaku miduduc tu kawaw nida, tu nipabeli nu paudipay a sapikawawan, taneng mapaedap nu paudipay i takuwan.
kapatayan ci Yi-li-sa-pay cayay hen pikikun, nikapatay nida mihedektu tu Du-yi wancaw. tunika tuas nida, nai' henay ku wantan nida tu midaydayay a tademaw, pasayda tu i iluc nida miadih, nipatayan nida a Su-ke-lan-ma-li a wawa ci Cen-mu-se. nika caay henay pangangani ci nida tu sapilaylayan nu tademw.
caynem seplu mihcaan lu bulad tusip demiad kapatayan i Sa-li- niyaduan a Li-ci-mun tahudan nu lumaan. tademen i Lun-tun-si-min kiwkay. milaylayay tu kawaw nida ci Cen-mu-se tawya malaSu-ke-lan a Cen-mu-se luose. tawya u In-ke-lan atu Su-ke-lan cacaytu ku tahudan nu sakakaay, malingatu tu Pu-lei-ten palecad a sayaway nu Wan-se, nika In-ke-lan atu Su-ke-lan nina tusaay a kanatalan kawaw nu sihu nida ku nida a kawawan. kapatayan nida tu lima a bataan nu nikudan, malepacaw ku labuay nu kanatal, ci Aw-li-fuo.Ke'lu-wi-e mipatay tu kuo-wan, saan midiputay kaku tu kanatalan a bakian sa, u In-kuo malasaapuyuay a In-ci-li-kun-he-kuo. 1603324--50·
kalalidan atu sausi ci Yi-li-sa-pay u In-kuo likisian u sakanamuhan a tahudan. tusep septu mihcaan, u BBC musakamuay tu binacadan a nipipilian " nu cacay a lasubuan nu palawinaan i In-kuo a tademaw", ci Yi-li-sa-pay sakapitu ku ngangan nida, milakuuyt tu dayday nu tahudan. tusep seplim mihcaan, itini i likisian nu tilibian a nipikilukan "sasawinaan nu tahudan a Cun-cu" likisi atu misiluday a tademaw mikenih tu sabaw tusa nu In-kuo cun-cu Patinsu, ci Yi-li-sa-pay midemec makaala tu satalakaway nu tinsu sipwal ku tisuan. 2002BBC"100"2005History Channel48
